Package: unacloud

[Groovy] Class ClusterController

    • unacloud.ClusterController

    • This Controller contains actions to manage cluster services: crud and deploy cluster. This class render pages for user or process request in services to update entities, there is session verification before all actions

      Authors:
      CesarF

          Properties 
          Type Name and description

          Makes session verifications before executing any action

          Representation of cluster service

          Representation of User Restriction service

          Delete cluster action.

      • Method Detail

        • java.lang.Object delete()

          Delete cluster action. Receives the cluster id and responses success and redirect to index after deletion

          Returns:

        • java.lang.Object deployOptions()

          Deploy options action that brings the form with deploying options for each image in the cluster

          Returns:
          limits shown in the information of form and cluster to be deployed

        • java.lang.Object externalDeployOptions()

          Action used to render view to deploy the cluster in external

          Returns:

        • java.lang.Object index()

          Action by default

        • java.lang.Object list()

          Cluster list action

          Returns:
          list of all clusters owned by user

        • java.lang.Object newCluster()

          New cluster creation action that sends the available images for the user

          Returns:
          list of ordered images that user can add to a new cluster

        • java.lang.Object save()

          Action to create a new cluster. It redirects to index after saving
